name: HTWG Monopoly
tagline: Extension to HTWG Monopoly with a web client built using the Play Framework 2.2 for WebTech
body:
# Welcome to HTWG MONOPOLY
This is a webversion of the existing HTWG-Monopoly found here: [HTWG-Monopoly](https://github.com/T1m1/de.htwg.se.monopoly) on GitHub

## Why

This project is part of an assignment of the lecture Webtechnologies at the HTWG in Konstanz.

## How

This project is build with various technologies in order to cover up some of the techniques how to provide a web application. Used technology:

+ HTML & CSS
+ Bootstrap
+ Play framework (scala)
+ Angular
+ jQuery & Ajax
+ Javascript
+ WebSockets
+ Polymer
+ Heroku

This project is still under construction and will eventually go online and will be playable with a browser.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
